room.label: kitchen
room.title: The Kitchen
room.description: You climbed into a messy kitchen.. There is dust floating in the air. The counters are littered with junk. These counters probably have something useful on them. I probably need a weapon.

activities.label: table
activities.title: : Dinner table
activities.description: There are knives and forks lying all over this table

activities.title: : Kitchen Sink
activities.description: This is just an empty kitchen sink
